section.summary:
Introduction to EIP

Join the Webinar Classroom, Tuesday 9:00 am - 12:15 pm Pacific Time.

This week we will have our first class webinar. During the webinar, we will review the course syllabus, discuss the history of evidence-informed medicine, and start discussing the pros and cons of EIP in our field. In addition, we will begin our journey into basic statistics with a discussion of descriptive statistics. Please have the class syllabus on hand during the webinar.

Due Next Week:

  1. Kligler & Weeks 2014 (Read before posting in Discussion Forum #1)
  2. Initial Post for Discussion Forum #1 due May 16th by 9:00am Pacific Time.
